name: Swoop (itch) (Zuvr)
description:
(Be sure to play in fullscreen)

Dive in to the depths of the crumbling castle in which you serve in order to save the princess from an ugly fate!

Only you can swoop in and push her out of the way of all the falling debris!

"Swoop" (name not final) is a quick platform racer where your goal is to overtake as much of the falling rubble as possible before time runs out, place yourself below the planks and kick off of them for a big boost!

CONTROLS:
Arrow keys to move (including up and down!)
Space to kick off of planks (or finish the game :D)
"R" to reset the level if you get stuck or wanna improve your score

Be sure to vote and comment also on the Ludum Dare page:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/swoop-save-the-princess-from-falling-rubb...

SOURCE CODE
